org.epics.pvData.pv
Interface FieldCreate

public interface FieldCreate

Interface for creating introspection interfaces.

Author:
mrk

Method Summary

          Create an Array field.

Method Detail

createScalar

Scalar createScalar(java.lang.String fieldName,
                    ScalarType scalarType)
Create a ScalarField.

Parameters:
fieldName - The field name.
scalarType - The scalar type.
Returns:
a Field interface for the newly created object.
Throws:
An - IllegalArgumentException if an illegal type is specified.

createArray

Array createArray(java.lang.String fieldName,
                  ScalarType elementType)
Create an Array field.

Parameters:
fieldName - The field name
elementType - The Type for array elements
Returns:
An Array Interface for the newly created object.

createStructure

                          Field[] field)
Create a Structure field.

Parameters:
fieldName - The field name
field - The array of Fields for the structure.
Returns:
a Structure interface for the newly created object.
